channel.title: Personal Media Server on Christian Kündig
channel.description: Recent content in Personal Media Server on Christian Kündig

item.title: HDHomerun Server Emulation in Tvheadend
item.description: Time to retire tvhProxy by adding HDHomerun emulation to Tvheadend.

item.title: Why WebVTT subtitles in Plex don't work
item.description: For some reason video files downloaded from the web won’t play in Plex if they have subtitles.

item.title: tvhProxy: Streaming TVHeadend into Plex DVR
item.description: Plex launched it’s DVR feature in 2016. Unfortunately, it only supports either DVR tuners connected to the server directly or HDHomeRun devices. tvhProxy fixes that.

item.title: Extracting EPG data from the TV7 IPTV service
item.description: Init7, my FTTH provider has a great IPTV offering called TV7 Unfortunately there’s no way to fetch the EPG data.
